modules.openmpi: loaded to provide the MPI library

system_information.lscpu: used to list the CPU information
system_information.nvidia-smi: used to query the NVIDIA GPU information
system_information.numactl -H: used to list the NUMA topology information

program_execution.mpirun: used to execute the program in parallel with MPI
program_execution.OMP_NUM_THREADS: set to ${SLURM_CPUS_PER_TASK} to enable OpenMP with the specified number of threads

timing.start_time: captures the time at the start of the execution
timing.end_time: captures the time at the end of the execution
timing.elapsed_time: calculates the difference between start and end times
